CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Dynamics relative to Crimson Group?
SRP.A: Echo Dynamics is {below} Crimson Group in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara Solutions relative to Oracle Systems?
SRP.A: Luminara Solutions is {above} Oracle Systems in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Dynamics relative to Aether Corp?
SRP.A: Echo Dynamics is {below} Aether Corp in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aether Corp}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Group}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Luminara Solutions's minimum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Luminara Solutions's minimum Patent Applications is in {2014}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Dynamics's maximum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Dynamics's maximum Patent Applications is in {2004}.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2009, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 2004 and 2018?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 2005 and 2009 was {lower} than between 2004 and 2018.

NC.Q: Between 2010 and 2013, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 2004 and 2006?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 2010 and 2013 was {lower} than between 2004 and 2006.

NC.Q: Between 2007 and 2015, did the total Patent Applications experience a larger or smaller change than between 2006 and 2007?
NC.A: The change in total patent applications between 2007 and 2015 was {larger} than between 2006 and 2007.

NC.Q: Between 2004 and 2008, did the total Patent Applications experience a larger or smaller change than between 2009 and 2012?
NC.A: The change in total patent applications between 2004 and 2008 was {smaller} than between 2009 and 2012.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Aether Corp} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Oracle Systems and Aether Corp first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Oracle Systems and Aether Corp first exchanged leading positions in {2006}.
